Yes, here are some products you can consider for detangling or conditioning your Maltese's fur:

1. Burts' Bees for Dogs Detangling Spray: This spray contains nourishing coconut oil and helps to detangle and soften the fur of your Maltese. It's easy to use and leaves a fresh scent.

2. Chris Christensen Ice on Ice Detangling Spray: This spray contains a blend of conditioning agents and aloe vera to help detangle your dog's coat quickly and easily. It nourishes and strengthens the coat, making it soft and shiny.

3. The Stuff Dog Conditioner: The Stuff Dog Conditioner is a leave-in conditioner that revitalizes and detangles your Maltese's coat. It is made of natural ingredients and can be used on wet or dry fur.

4. FURminator deTangling Waterless Spray: This is a waterless spray that contains a blend of natural ingredients to help detangle knots and mats. It also conditions the coat, leaving it smooth and shiny.

These products are all specially formulated for dogs and are safe to use on your Maltese. Be sure to select a product that is suitable for your dog's specific coat type and needs.

I hope this information is helpful in selecting a suitable product for your Maltese's fur. Remember to always read the label and follow the instructions when using grooming products on your dog.
